relating to or typical of shamanism (= a form of religion involving a person who is thought to have special powers to influence spirits): Shamanistic traditions are preserved in the folklore of isolated mountain valleys. The plant has long been used in shamanistic rituals by groups in southern Mexico. See
shamanism
